metadata.title: CVE-2018-11307 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in FasterXML jackson-databind 2.0.0 through 2.9.5.Use of Jackson default typing along with a gadget class from iBatis allowsexfiltration of content. Fixed in 2.7.9.4, 2.8.11.2, and 2.9.6.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
